title: CROWNFUL Mini Fridge, 4 Liter/6 Can Portable Cooler and Warmer Personal Fridge for Skin Care, Cosmetics, Food, Great for Bedroom, Office, Car, Dorm, ETL Listed (White)

all_images.alt: CROWNFUL Mini Fridge, 4 Liter/6 Can Portable Cooler and Warmer Personal Fridge for Skin Care, Cosmetics, Food, Great for Bedroom, Office, Car, Dorm, ETL Listed (White)

raw_desc: [Multifunctional Mini Fridge] An excellent little device for storing food, drinks, beer, snacks, breast milk, cosmetics, and skincare products. This is the perfect present for women because it also functions as a personal skin care fridge. [Compact and Portable] The Crownful mini fridge has a 4-Liter capacity that can store up to six 330ml. soda cans. The interior size is 13.5x14x20cm. It comes with a convenient carry handle and a detachable shelf, making it simple to transport. Excellent for use in bedrooms, offices, dorm rooms, road trips, boats, campgrounds, and more. [Cooling and Warming Features] To cool or heat the refrigerator, simply turn a switch! It can keep it warm up to 65 °C on the internal thermostat or cool down to 18°C-22°C below the ambient temperature to keep your food, beverages, and other items at the optimal temperature. [Super Quiet Operation] The brush-less high-grade fan motor in the portable electric cooler & warmer fridge can operate silently (25 dB Sleep Mode) and last longer than ever. [Versatile Power Options] This skincare fridge includes plugs for both standard home outlets and 12V car chargers. Modern cooling makes the small refrigerator consume less power than most laptops, with innovative safety technology that is ETL certified for long-lasting durability.
